mapper.select: select c.documento as c_documento, i.id as i_id, ir.id as id , ir.fechainiciorenta as fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta as fechainiciorenta FROM VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir inner join VI_CLIENTES as c on c.documento = CLIENTES_DOCUMENTO inner join VI_ITEMS as i on ITEMS_id = i.id WHERE ir.id = #{id};
